title.rendered: Epigram Headphones/Earphones Wired Earbuds Noise Isolating Sport Earphones with Built-in Microphone & Volume Control…

content.rendered:
These wired headphones are suitable with iPhone Xs Max/ XR/ 7,7 Plus, iPhone 8,8 Plus, iPhone X.

Rich and deep sound: The audio system inside have been designed to maximise sound manufacturing and decrease sound loss, which suggests you get wealthy studio bass sounds and superior audio high quality.

Made for you: With better safety towards sweat and water, headphones are designed to final, they adapt to you and your way of life. Perfect for sports activities or every day journeys.

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
1.Easy to Use: This earpiece is extraordinarily simple to make use of. Simply plug within the headphones into your charging port and you might be able to take heed to music, make telephone calls and far more!
2.Sturdy & Strong: This headphone twine is extraordinarily sturdy and capable of face up to pulling and heavy use!
3.Playback, Pause and Call: Also embody a built-in distant management that means that you can regulate quantity, management audio and video playback, and reply calls with a button pinch.
4.Compatibility: Compatible with iPhone Xs Max/ XR/ 7,7 Plus, iPhone 8,8 Plus, iPhone X.
5.Satisfaction Guaranteed: We assure that you may be joyful with your buy of those headphones. If for some cause you aren’t, merely tell us and we’ll prepare a substitute product or full refund!
